resources.string: \"New Game\" starts a new game of chess where two players can play against each other locally.
\"Continue\" allows the user to play the last saved game of chess.
While playing, the state of the game will be saved. If "New Game" is selected while there is already a saved game, the saved game will be overwritten with a new game.
An alternative mode of chess where you are given a chess scenario to solve. Try to make the best moves in the least number of attempts.
The theme settings allow you to change the colors of the app. You may also disable/enable animation or allow/disallow the ability to undo in a standard game of chess.
